preference.name: AWC_visFloorPlaneOrientation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default floor plane orientation for the Viewer in the Active Workspace client. Valid values are: * 0 : XY : Reorients the floor plane to XY * 1 : XZ : Reorients the floor plane to XZ. This is the default value. * 2 : YZ : Reorients the floor plane to YZ * 3 : -XY : Reorients the floor plane to -XY * 4 : -XZ : Reorients the floor plane to -XZ * 5 : -YZ : Reorients the floor plane to -YZ
